channel.title: Vcs-upload on Cray System Management (CSM)
channel.description: Recent content in Vcs-upload on Cray System Management (CSM)

item.title: Argo Templates
item.description: Argo Templates vcs-upload-content.yaml This template will upload the current product’s git content to the gitea server. This operation is calling containerized code living here cf-gitea-import. In the current state of this template, there are a few required parameters: All of these parameters may be overridden by passing them through argo with: -p parameter=foo cf_import_gitea_org - Defaults to ‘cray’ cf_import_content_hostpath - Defaults to /content cf_import_results_hostpath - Defaults to /results This is the path on the management node where the product’s content and results will be stored so it will be used as a volumeMount in the template.
